name: Desktop 88
description:
I made a little game called "Desktop 88".  Hope you enjoy my work  :)

The name comes from the famous Flak 88 and it is the main weapon you control in this game. It is a singleplayer game that test your skills in calculating wind and gravity effect plus your sense when to activate which ordnance type. Game is split in two types of battlefields, air and ground combat, in both you fight the british forces as you simulate the Battle of Britain. Every game starts with air combat portion which ends when the timer reaches "END" - then you move on to ground combat.

READ THE CONTROLS BEFORE GAMEPLAY BECAUSE YOU WILL BE LOST  Any time you wish you can ESC and read them again.

Be very aware that you must manually set the fuse delay for your shell. Using (keyboard num3, num4, num5) you can switch between 3,4 or 5 seconds delay and that way you determine after how many seconds it will explode in air. Very useful if countering bad wind conditions - it is all explained in controls as well.

 

***Features*** 

AIR COMBAT

Fight off waves of enemy aircraft while at the same time protecting your bombers heading home. Avoid hitting Red Cross balloons as well.

 

SKILLS;

- Standard shell 

- Light barrage

- Heavy barrage

- Bf-109 Interceptor Squad - They level up depending on combat performance increasing their stats!

- Mine shells

- Barrage balloons

- Smoke shell

- MG42

- Flakvierling 2,0cm

 

GROUND COMBAT

Help your friendly ground troops capture enemy flags. Try not to hit them or the Red Cross tent. Ground is completly destructable and units will react to it so be carefull not to dig deep holes.

 

SKILLS;

- Standard HE shell

- Heavy high explosive shell

- Armor piercing shell

- Cluster shell

- Incendiary shell

- Smoke shell

- Fully controlable Ju-52 (Supply drop + bomb ability)

- Fully controlable Bf-109 (Strafing run with high rates of fire)

- Fully controlable Ju-87 (Strafing run with slower rates of fire + dive bombing ability)

 

Thank You!
